document.full_text: before succumbing to the phillies, the mets heard good news: david wright isn't holding a grudge, and he and ike davis are close to returning.
document.title: phillies 6, mets 4: wright is magnanimous; bullpen is too generous
lines_and_colors: before succumbing to the phillies, the mets heard good news: david wright isn't holding a grudge, and he and ike davis are close to returning.
